review: Easy to install and activate; easy to use; minimal physical profile (it's SMALL).  Really like access to Amazon Cloud Storage, as -- with Amazon Prime -- I can store photos for free AND VIEW THEM ON THE TV.

review: We got two when Amazon sold them for 20 bucks. They worked perfectly ever since. Yes Amazon is trying to push their content (it is an Amazon stick after-all), but it has a good selection of channels (at least by our preferences) and it is quick to connect and play content. For the price paid, this is great gadget. At current price I might think twice before purchasing it.
author: Sebas

review: The First TV Stick at initial setup was wonderful. It connected to my WiFi just fine, went to sleep, then no longer was able to connect to WiFi. I have a Cisco 1142 with WPA2 and dual band. Tried using a different access point under a different SSID, and it works flawlessly every time.  This is the only device i have ever experienced an issue with and we have tested over 30 different brands/styles of devices on our WiFi.The device has too many features to return, but this truly is an annoyance that i need to run another access point in order to utilize this device.  Please force an update or come up with a fix!I am giving this 2 stars because nobody ever reads 3 star reviews, and this anomaly needs to be resolved!
author: Michael Prostka
